marklogic.body:
THE ONLY SANE-RIGHT PEACE SOLUTION= BOTH SIDES.... TO COME TO THEIR GOD-GIVEN SENSES= BELIEVE BY FAITH & RECEIVE LORD-KING YAHUSHUA=JESUS THE CHRIST= YOUR ONLY SAVIOUR-MESSIAH=ABBA FATHER GOD IN FLESH=PRINCE OF TRUE PEACE=TRUTH HIMSELF
ONLY ABBA FATHER GOD=YAHUSHUA= JESUS CHRIST=MESSIAH ...HAS DEFEATED ... HIS ONCE FORMER HIGH ANOINTED CHERUB =SATAN=LUCIFER & ALL HIS HORD OF ANTI-CHRIST DEMONS OF HELL ON EARTH IT IS WRITTEN
SO WE-SINNERS WITHOUT YAHUSHUA=JESUS CHRIST = HAVE NOT A HOPE IN THIS HELL ON EARTH OF WINNING AGAINST SATAN=EVI=ANTI-CHRIST= FALSE MESSIAH
WITHOUT MESSIAH TO CLEANSE AWAY ALL OUR SINS.. WE SINNERS WILL REMAIN OPPRESSED-MANIPULATED-CONTROLLED= UNDER SATAN
WHY EVERYONE IS BLAMING EACH OTHER...FOR THEIR OPPRESSION...WHEN IT IS SATAN OPPRESSING ALL OF THEM...BY THEIR SINS SATAN-ANTI-CHRIST DEMONS=SPIRITS GAIN CONTROL OVER EVERY SINNER'S LIFE
SIN= IS WHY THIS SINFUL WICKED WORLD IS SO MESSED UP TODAY
STOP BLAMING EVERYONE ELSE.. LOOK IN THE MIRROR... HOW CLEAN IS YOUR WALK WITH FATHER GOD =LORD-KING JESUS CHRIST=YAHUSHUA MESSIAH ??
IF YOU HAVEN'T ...HAVEN'T COME TO LORD YAHUSHUA=JESUS CHRIST... THEN......YOU ARE DECEIVED=HELD HOSTAGE TO SATAN... BY YOUR SINS....
FOR WITHOUT LORD YAHUSHUA=JESUS CHRIST=MESSIAH ... TO WASH AWAY ALL YOUR SINS... FATHER GOD WILL NEVER GIVE HIS HOLY SPIRIT OF TRUTH .....TO SATAN'S SINNERS... SO YOU HAVE NO GOD-TRUTH... IN YOU PLAIN & SIMPLE
STOP CONDEMNING -POINTING YOUR FINGER AT EVERYONE ELSE'S SINS... ONLY SATAN=ANTI-CHRIST INFECTED SINNERS WOULD DO THAT.... SIN IS SIN ....IN ABBA FATHER GOD'S EYES & ....NO SIN IS WORSE THAN ANY OTHER SIN EVERY SIN=DESERVES DEATH...IT IS WRITTEN
IF YOU THINK YOUR FILTHY RAGS=SINS HAVE NO STENCH IN GOD'S NOSTRILS ... THAT YOUR FILTHY SINS ...DO NOT MAKE ABBA FATHER GOD NAUSEATED... WANT TO VOMIT... THINK AGAIN...
....PRIDE GOT SATAN KICKED OUT OF HEAVEN & PRIDE WILL KEEP YOU OUT TOO..... IT IS WRITTEN
ISAIAH 17...YOU ARE RIGHT
DOUG POULOGE... IT ISN'T ANYONE'S PRIVATE CRUSADE.. THERE IS A REAL WAR GOING ON = 1. FATHER GOD=YAHUSHUA=JESUS CHRIST =MESSIAH =GOOD ...AGAINST 2. SATAN=ANTI-CHRIST=FALSE MESSIAH=EVIL
....FOR THE SOULS OF EVERYONE ON EARTH= YOUR SOUL TOO
WE ALL=JEWS-ARABS=PALS-GENTIELES CAME FORTH FROM FATHER GOD=HEAVEN
THE REAL GOD GIVES CHOICE...
BUT ....WHETHER JEWS-ARABS=PALS-GENTILES RETURN BACK TO HEAVEN=FATHER GOD = IT'S EACH PERSON'S CALL- CHOICE
FOR NO SIN=SINNER CAN EVER ENTER HEAVEN= ABBA FATHER GOD'S HOLY PURE PRESENCE WITHOUT....FIRST ........COMING TO LORD-KING YAHUSHUA=JESUS CHRIST & ASKING LORD-KING JESUS=MESSIAH TO FORGIVE ALL YOUR SINS & CLEANSE YOU WITH HIS ATONING PRECIOUS SACRIFICAL=ACCEPTED BLOOD SIN-OFFERING ACCEPTED ....BY ABBA FATHER GOD ....FOR YOUR SINS & MINE
IN FACT...JESUS' SHED BLOOD ON THAT CROSS =CALVERY IS FOR THE WHOLE WORLD'S SINS = YOM KIPPUR TO END ALL YOM KIPPUR... ATONEMENT TO END ALL ATONEMENT .. END ALL CHICKEN WAVING
UNLESS ....YOU COME TO MESSIAH=CHRIST =YAHUSHUA... ASK HIM TO SAVE YOUR SOUL FROM THIS HELL ON EARTH & HELL ETERNAL... WELL...THEN...YOU WILL PERISH IN YOUR SINS =FILL SATAN'S KINGDOM IN HELL ... IT IS WRITTEN
ABBA FATHER GOD=YAHUSHUA=JESUS CHRIST MESSIAH GIVE ....CHOICE
BUT SATAN SAYS...DO IT MY WAY OR DIE SATAN'S WAY IS SIN...CAUSE HE KNOWS YOUR SINS GIVE HIM COMPLETE CONTROL OVER YOUR THOUGHTS-MIND-BODY=MARRIAGE=FAMILY=LIFE NATION .....& ....ULTIMATELY WHOLE WORLD (FORCED WORLD CONFORMITY THROUGH FEAR & TERROR =EVIL=SATAN)
WHY THE WORLD IS SO WICKED.. SINFUL.... INSANE ...CRAZY...DARK... .. WITH UNSPEAKABLE CRIMES....EVIL SINFUL PEOPLE UNDER SATAN=ANTI-CHRIST DEKON CONTROL...WILL LOSE SELF-CONTROL ... LOSE THEIR MINDS....IT IS WRITTEN
EACH PERSON CHOSES EITHER: ABBA FATHER GOD=CHRIST=MESSIAH=GOOD OR SATAN=ANTI-CHRIST=FALSE MESSIAH=EVIL
SATAN'S FALSE FREEDOM=TO CHOSE YOUR SIN CLUBS= YOUR ULTIMATE DEATH LIFE SENTENCE
ONLY CHRIST=MESSIAH HAS DEFEATED SATAN & ANTI-CHRIST DEMONS OF HELL ON EARTH
...SO WITHOUT LORD-KING YAHUSHUA=JESUS CHRIST =MESSIAH...WE-MORTAL HUMANS=SINNERS CANNOT FIGHT EVIL WICKED SATANIC SPIRITS & WIN
WHY SATAN HAS DECEIVED THE SINFUL WORLD-UNDER HIS CONTROL... TO REJECT JESUS CHRIST =YAHUSHUA =MESSIAH .....THEIR ONLY HOPE ... TO GET BACK TO HEAVEN=FATHER GOD=TRUTH
....SO SATAN CAN KEEP THE SINNER UNDER HIS BONDAGE=HELD HOSTAGE=CAPTIVE BY THEIR SINS= HELL BOUND FOREVER & EVER
YOU DON'T SEE THIS GOD-TRUTH IN NEWSPAPERS... WELL... GUESS WHO CONTROLS THE EDITORS... ??
